directions: [["Heat oil in Dutch oven over medium heat. Remove sausage from casing, add sausage and beef. Cook until browned. "],["Stir in onion, bell pepper, garlic, jalapenos, chili powder, cumin, and salt. Cook, stirring often, until onion softens, about 4 minutes. "],["Add beans, tomatoes, broth, tomato paste, cilantro and parsley. Stir to combine."],["Cook, partly covered, until flavors have blended, about 3 hours. "],["Adjust seasonings as necessary, serve with desired toppings. "],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
